dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various urban scenes.

dcterms:description: A collection of panoramic images sourced from Google Street View, used for visual localization.

dcterms:description: A dataset of panoramic images obtained from Google Street View, used for generating gnomonic views for visual localization.
dcterms:title: Panoramic image dataset (from Google Street View)
